table.name: vtiger_listairports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listairports` ( `listairportsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `airport` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `country` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `popular` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listairportsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listairportscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listairportscf` ( `listairportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listairportsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
